snippet: The process created by Mr. Whitfield could completely replace the air in the room 10 times a minute.
abstract: Willis Whitfield, inventor of the clean room, necessary precursor to manufacture of modern electronics, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: The process created by Mr. Whitfield could completely replace the air in the room 10 times a minute.

headline.seo: Willis Whitfield, Clean Room Inventor, Dies at 92
headline.main: Willis Whitfield, Inventor of Clean Room That Purges Tiny Particles, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Willis Whitfield, Inventor of Clean Room That Purges Tiny Particles, Dies at 92
